name: Over-Populated Destruction
description:
THE WORLD IS RUNNING OUT OF SPACE!!

There are too many humans and not enough space to build houses for them.
The government has been faced with the troubles of what to do....
So they destroy the wildlife to make more space!

Take part in a mini adventure through the mountains to escape from doom and get to safety... even if it means being with humans :joy: 
Play through 3 hard-crafted levels filled with collectables and hidden secrets.

(Made for Ludum Dare 42: Running out of Space)
